name: ClaustrO (Kohfye)
description:
This game was created live on twitch.tv/kohfye as part of a Game Dev Speedrun! Check out the video (coming... eventually) and don't forget to subscribe to him on YouTube and follow him on Twitch!

Move your cursor along a treacherous cave, which closes up on you every step of the way. How long will you last?

Controls:

Click with the left mouse button to start the game, and move your cursor to guide the ball. That's pretty much it.
